website_summaries.verdict: The Garmin Vivomove is a well-crafted and stylish watch that provides bare-bones fitness tracking, but you're trading function for form.
pros: and can track steps and sleep automatically.
Can sync with Android and iOS, and can be worn in the shower and while swimming
cons: Occasional connection issues with the Garmin app
can't be used with other Garmin trackers
lacks advanced features like a heart rate sensor or smartphone alerts

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this watch.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this watch. It works great until you have to change the battery. I took the watch to a jeweler to get a new battery. But once you break the seal the watch is ruined. I wore the watch after i had the battery replaced, moisture got inside and it wasnt in water. Its a once and done watch. Garmin has good products, but this isnt one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stivers

customer_reviews.title: Well done!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped for an analog fitness tracker hybrid for several months prior to purchasing this one and was so disappointed to see so few brands offering a watch with a second hand. I received this as a birthday gift and it’s exactly what I wanted. It’s an attractive timepiece with a nice weight. I like that it gives you feedback at a glance on your progress. I also like the added feature of the red bar that indicates if you’ve been sitting too long. It syncs up easily to the app on my phone. I did trade out the band for a canvas one, and even that was super easy. I will recommend this to others. Well done, Garmin!
customer_reviews.author: jennandforrest

customer_reviews.title: Love my new "not ugly" activity tracker!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Garmin Vivofit 2 with this, and I'm thrilled with the look. I was so tired of wearing an item that wasn't pretty, and this is a classy look. I bought the white sport, but replaced the silicone band with a gray leather band ($12 here on Amazon) and the result is a sharp looking watch that doesn't scream, "I'm wearing an activity tracker!" It does not sync automatically, but that is not a concern for me since it syncs so easily when I'm ready to sync. The face is rather large, but works with my petite frame. I got it for about $62, which I thought was great!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Bell

customer_reviews.title: While that may seem like a bad thing
customer_reviews.text: Watch keeps ticking... but fitness monitor stopped today. The battery finally hit it's last legs. While that may seem like a bad thing, I checked my amazon purchase date thinking "surely it hasn't been a year yet" but the battery lasted 1 day short of 13 months from my delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch even though I have the entry level version. Love the displays to keep you motivated and moving. Seems durable and love that there is no charging and can go underwater. The cons are that the bevel sometimes pulls out unintentionally stopping the watch and, this far the ability to sync with my phone seems somewhat irregular (sometimes it won't sync and other times it will sync but not update step totals....So yesterday it only recorded 351 steps though I walk a half mile to and from work and at lunch time. Would also be nice if it had a simple date function. Overall good, but needs some work before I could recommend purchase by others.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: I really like the design and anticipated using the functions with Garmin ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried two Garmin Vivomove watches. I really like the design and anticipated using the functions with Garmin Connect. Unfortunately, even with two hours of customer service we were not able to complete setup or properly pair with Bluetooth. According to a Garmin forum the problem is Garmin software will not work with Android OS 7.0 and up. When customers upgraded to 7.0 problems began to happen. I have to conclude that my Moto Z Force Droid with Android 7.1.1 is the problem. It would be nice is Garmin customer service had been more forthcoming or that the advertising would have indicated problems.
customer_reviews.author: D ARNOLD

customer_reviews.title: Returning after 2 hours!
customer_reviews.text: Have to return it after just receiving it. This was a gift for my fiance for Christmas. Having watch out of the box that wont keep time is a little ridiculous in my opinion. Every forty to sixty minutes the clock face freezes, and he has to reset it. I would not recommend the refurbished version.
customer_reviews.author: Hollow23

customer_reviews.title: I like the watch and it does what it advertised to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch and it does what it advertised to do. The problem for the "classic" black is that it is really hard to see the black hands, especially in dim light. A light color on the tip of the hands or some florescent on the tip of the hands or a thin line of light color on the black hands would make a huge difference. I understand the black-on-black is a cool style, but it's still a watch and I need to be able to see the time quickly without having to get a reflection on it in order to see the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond Macaluso

customer_reviews.title: Sync issues
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch but doesn't stay synced with my Android phone. Requires constant resetting. Otherwise, I like the look and feel for an everyday watch.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great tracks my steps and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works Great tracks my steps and easy to use. I have had it for 6 months and it is still going!splashed in the pool with it on and still works just like new. The only issue is the time is sometimes off and have to reset the time about every 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is Junk!
customer_reviews.text: All was great for about a month. Then the watch quit communicating with my phone. I tried numerous times over the next few weeks to get them to communicate with no luck. I took my phone to verizon to verify weather the problem was not my phones blue tooth. It was not a phone issue. So was just using the watch as a watch. After another month the watch stopped working. Put a new battery in and it still did not work. This watch definitely did not perform as expected. I would not recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Budas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not very thrilled. With the first one, the stem popped off. The company replaced it, no problem, but with this one, the watch won't keep time correctly while wearing it. It loses time. If it sits on the dresser, it keeps time just fine. Too bad, because it looks really nice, and worked well as a dress watch.
customer_reviews.author: Wild about reading

customer_reviews.title: They could tell me earlier
customer_reviews.text: It was not until read the little booklet included in the package that the low end of the operating temperature range is 32 degrees F. I live in Maine. If they are right, the watch is useless. Forced to return.
customer_reviews.author: wfb

customer_reviews.title: Quality Assurance Fail
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged in an important area: the movement progress bar. Does Garmin not have a quality assurance person who has the power of sight? It was a pretty obvious flaw...
customer_reviews.author: J. Pittman

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The Garmin vivomove Sport is just as advertised. I use the vivomove on the weekdays for work and the vivoSmart HR on the weekends. It is surprisingly accurate. The only thing I would change is a backlight or glow in the dark hands for night. It doesn't do long runs very well but you can edit your activities. Now if they can also add a date to that it would be great. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: michael rambo

customer_reviews.title: Good looking fitness watch
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch for my husband and it counts his steps. Good looking fitness watch
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: BIG watch face
customer_reviews.text: This watch is MUCH bigger than it looks. I currently wear a Citizens watch and a Fitbit. I was hoping to replace it with one product. The watch face is bigger than my current watch and fitbit combined. It is much too big (ugly) to wear. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Simply perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love this simple watch...I carry my phone on me all the time, so a watch that just tells time and tracks steps is perfect. It just uses a regular watch battery that when it needs to be replaced is well worth taking to a local jeweler to replace. I’ve had this watch almost 3 years and plan on having it many more years to come. I get compliments on its style all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Smith

customer_reviews.title: Like not even for a full day when (once in ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch does not stay synced with my app. EVER. Like not even for a full day when (once in a blue moon) I can get it to sync at all. I have no idea what I'm doing wrong. I am married to a tech-y guy, so I feel like this watch is just glitchy and a huge waste of my money. Do not proceed with purchasing this watch. You will be remorseful. :( I like the look of this watch, but I already had a nice watch to tell time. I wanted a watch to track my steps accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and more! Bought this for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny and more! Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He works with athletics and has to dress up a lot but also wear athletic gear, so this watch fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looks, but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this watch and really liked how it looked and was enjoying the use of it, but after about a week it stopped working. We may have just gotten a lemon, but she is hesitant to order another at this price and have it quit again.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep time
customer_reviews.text: Was 5 starts until today when (less than 3 months after I purchased it) the watch stopped keeping time. Keeps on running slow. I keep resetting it...less than an hour later, 15 min behind. I'm so disappointed because I thought I found the one!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina M Day

customer_reviews.title: Good Watch but Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Bumped into a table one time and scratched the face of the watch severely. The watch still functions fine but it makes me sad every time I notice it which is constantly. I've owned other fitness trackers that were not this fragile. Otherwise, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Get it now ... Garmin's Best
customer_reviews.text: They know longer make this, but for the price you can get it for...well worth it!!! Changed batter for the first time yesterday and have owned it for 1.5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It does remind me to move and does track sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: It does remind me to move and does track sleep to a point as well as steps per day. What I wanted
customer_reviews.author: JD in Montana

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch, okay app.
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch, but the app is a little confusing. I like that there is no charging required.
customer_reviews.author: Cleversea

customer_reviews.title: NOT RELIABLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch originally in 2018. It lasted less than a year. I called customer support, and they replaced the watch. The replacement lasted less than a year before it completely stopped. I love the look of the watch, but it is completely unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It's waterproof, tells time, and it's a step counter. I didn't want a fitbit or smart watch that I had to charge all the time. I would give it 5 starts, but sometimes the time actually is not accurate, but 90% of the time it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jerr Smith

customer_reviews.title: It worked for 2 weeks but has now stopped syncing ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 2 weeks but has now stopped syncing. It is hard to tell when I have reached my goal with the meter. it won't sync with my Motorola Droid Razr M.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: The Watch Crown is the Single Point of Failure!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this watch for less than two weeks yet the crown has gone missing. That rendered the watch completely useless because the crown is needed to trigger a sync with the app and to adjust time. Not to mention the waterproof-ness for the watch. Is this Garmin quality? Can't believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like I need it to and better quality then I was excepting
customer_reviews.author: Robert Guithues

customer_reviews.title: Nice and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice style. The battery is not too durable though... THe app is quite easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Abdiel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Watch meets my expectations and seems to sync fine. My only complaint is that the black hands ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch meets my expectations and seems to sync fine. My only complaint is that the black hands are sometimes difficult to see on the black face. It would be nice to have some type of illumination option in low light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great activity tracker.
customer_reviews.text: Great battery. Great look. Just needs a date display. Setup took 5 min.
customer_reviews.author: TDalias

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Activity tracker that doesn't scream it. I had a Withings activity tracker watch but it would not keep time.
customer_reviews.author: Vamom

customer_reviews.title: Older model, not as many functions. Great as a watch.
customer_reviews.text: Took time to get synced correctly. Too large to wear 24/7 so how is it rating my sleep as deep? Love the analog with second hand. Tracks steps.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but problem with battery
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch!! However, it keeps on stopping in time or becoming delayed suddenly. I’ve had to reset it several, especially in the past month but it’s too late to return now for a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: simple... just don't expect tons of data
customer_reviews.text: good style finally in a step tracker... primary goal is points for a work wellness program. works perfectly for what it is intended.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Uher

customer_reviews.title: he likes that it looks like a regular watch unlike the other fitness tracker but ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my husband, he likes that it looks like a regular watch unlike the other fitness tracker but still enjoys the durable, sweat proof wristband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, classy, functional.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, elegant, not trying too hard to be "smart" but with just enough information to keep you motivated. And it has classy looks you aren't embarrassed to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this if you own a Samsung S7 . Will not sync!
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks great. Can’t get phone to sync . Called tech support and they are working on it? No timeline available. A lot of glitches. Bad buy , stay away.
customer_reviews.author: rfulton74

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, works well and looks really good too
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, works well and looks really good too. The APP in my mobile syncs my data (steps, how much i sleep) and is simple and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Has a great classic look and good app for your smart phone
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and she loves it. Has a great classic look and good app for your smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sync to phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought new but the package was open and also the watch syncs with my phone but no data is transferred. Have done everything according to garmins troubleshooting page but still no change.
customer_reviews.author: Rashid

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Move bar didn’t work right out of box ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Move bar didn’t work right out of box. Thought I’d still give a chance and now clock stopped working. Save your money on this one
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in sinc.
customer_reviews.text: Watch works good, like the second hand. Does not stay in sinc with my phone, steps are not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect combination of durability and style. I wear this watch nearly every day and it is extremely accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: love it! tracking works great and it's a watch
customer_reviews.text: love it! tracking works great and it's a watch. only thing I miss is the link that send alerts from phone.
customer_reviews.author: Noble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A perfect watch with fitness tracker and the quality of Garmin!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to automatically sync with my phone despite being configured to. Otherwise does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R Poole

customer_reviews.title: Dead Battery on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped a defective product. Battery was dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Arguelles

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does lose time on occasion and I am not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it in July and it already stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: I wish I got a different one
customer_reviews.text: You cannot see anything from this watch is all black
customer_reviews.author: robert chan

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Lovely for everyday runs. This piece from Garmin is excellent. I’ll recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ibraheem O Muheeb

customer_reviews.title: Do you waterproof?
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It’s classy and it’s waterproof which is essential.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch, tracks steps well, do not like how it does not illuminate at night. Syncs well with iPhone and app was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped for and attractive! Excellent value for money and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ms WS Rall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch and fitness tracking device!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! It has gotten me out moving and thinking about my activity more, without any nagging.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Bad software, very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: The program that links the watch to the phone ("Garmin Connect") is terrible. The watch synced once, then stopped. Very disappointing. (The watch looks nice though :-/ )
customer_reviews.author: Ben Zajicek

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great look and accurate step count. Activity count must connect to computer.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Wrong stepcount, you can not see hour in the dark
customer_reviews.author: Kenan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. It looks great and is fine for tracking steps. Does track sleep too.
customer_reviews.author: Avery J.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and doesn't do much
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Cheaply made, and does nothing other than count steps. The display for steps is also inaccurate. I have my goal set to 10,000 steps/day, and it shows 100% complete at about 7500 steps actually done. The bluetooth doesn't work both ways, either: don't expect the dials on the watch to automagically sync with your phone - it's totally manual. No date display, nothing. If you think of this as a pedometer stuck in a watch, rather than a fitness device, that's about correct. Buy any other Garmin watch and you will be much happier.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for! Simple to sync ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Simple to sync and versatile enough to dress up or down. I will be ordering the stainless steel next.
customer_reviews.author: Kayce S.

customer_reviews.title: awesome battery life
customer_reviews.text: I have worn my vivofit for over two years now and it's still going strong, awesome battery life!! Decided to buy the vivomove because now I love Garmin and liked the idea of a watch that helps you stay active. I bought the rose gold and it's beautiful!! I have small wrists and it does look large on me, also have to clasp it on the last notch so the strap hangs out... but I still like it a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: battery life, sync issue, and ugly smartphone application
customer_reviews.text: nice concept. great build quality. classic looking.... everything i liked about this watch... battery life, sync issue, and ugly smartphone application by garmin. especially, black face one.... it is really hard to check time. this watch is failed. I will look forward to see 2nd generation with new application. Comparing with fitbit app. I believe garmin need to learn from them.
customer_reviews.author: PlaystationMan

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for over a month and it has never not sync'ed. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Best Tracker-But Large Band
customer_reviews.text: Update: I realize this watch is the most accurate tracker I have ever owned, and I have a bunch! Though the face is scratched up completely, I still love it. The leather bands stretch out and are expensive to replace. My wrist is very small and I had to have it on the last notch. The app was awful, but is recently great! I am thinking of investing in the sport model, now, instead of buying a new band.
customer_reviews.author: Noel R

customer_reviews.title: Vivomove great--Connect App so so
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like a watch and working well so far. Small issue with the Connect app not displaying correctly on my Samsung Galaxy Note 4 smartphone and Garmin support doesn't respond to my emails otherwise I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Watch works great but i have issues with the sync to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch works great but i have issues with the sync to my phone. Not sure if it is a Bluetooth issue with the phone or the watch. I wish it could be set to auto sync 2-3 times a day rather than having to manually push the stem to make it sync. In general what i wanted was a watch and an activity tracker and that's what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Lindow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you want an activity tracker that looks like a watch
customer_reviews.text: I have a Garmin Forerunner 220 which I use for outdoor activities such as running and cycling. I wanted an activity tracker to quantify my non-training and non-racing activity, and that also looked like a watch. This product is perfect! It looks great and it counts steps accurately. I like that you can customize the daily step goal and monitor your progress with the status bar. I have both the Vivomove and the Forerunner paired with my phone and I have not had any trouble syncing both devices. I have not used the sleep function yet, so I cannot comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Massie

customer_reviews.title: ... (and a little more help on this would be nice, Garmin)
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out how to work this (and a little more help on this would be nice, Garmin), I absolutely love it. I have gotten tons of compliments on it from people who just thought it was a watch and then went crazy when they figured out it was a Garmin. I can do everything with it - step track, sleep track, workout tracking, my food tracking AND it doesn't look like a fitness tracker. Love it! The things it can do are not revolutionary; the way it looks IS.
customer_reviews.author: Claire P.

customer_reviews.title: and it is amazing. Pros
customer_reviews.text: I have had my vivomove for just about 2 weeks now, and it is amazing. Pros: • Sleek and handsome timepiece • Fits standard watch bands (20mm) for easy customization • Super easy syncing to your phone via bluetooth • Step counter and Move meter are understated but easy to see at a glance Con: • The supplied band feels cheap compared to the piece, but it is durable and secure I highly recommend this anyone looking for a fitness tracker that doesn't have that "fitness" look
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This watch was great when I got it out of the package
customer_reviews.text: This watch was great when I got it out of the package. Within 2 weeks of wearing the watch, it stopped tracking my sleep or transferring sleep data. The steps bar seemed to have "burn" on the notches (they weren't completely white). The steps bar and move bar would go blank throughout the day. I will edit this review if my replacement does not have the same poor quality. Hopefully it was just a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Ugly Hide Size
customer_reviews.text: These watches are HUGE - more like 48mm or so. Looks grotesque on slim wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very attractive watch and I love the various watch bands offered
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive watch and I love the various watch bands offered. I change out the black and tan leather bands to correspond with my outfit, and this is very easy to do. I have had trouble with the watch syncing to the app on my phone. It doesn't always load. Honestly, though, I do not use a lot of the fitness tracking options. I just like the looks of the watch and it has a clear, large display of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, So far accurate works perfect. Great price and fast shipping. Definitely recommend merchant and the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Joe7911

customer_reviews.title: Don't think it will be somethig more than it is.
customer_reviews.text: it's a good product, but after all it's a watch band.
customer_reviews.author: jopastem

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work and I had to submit a RMA to Garmin. They require you to ship old devices back and give a $200 deposit. Waiting to see if the new device works any better.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: too bad it does not sync with other watches data
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Valerio N

customer_reviews.title: I got my watch damaged - the goal tracker bar ...
customer_reviews.text: I got my watch damaged - the goal tracker bar is almost blank (except the upper third) and gramin can't help me with it
customer_reviews.author: Boaz Eizenberg

customer_reviews.title: Does not synch. I want to return it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not synch. I want to return it. I returned one already and I want my money back on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Briggs

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: in picture shows silver frame but it was black, which i didnt want it.
customer_reviews.author: Jahangir Alam

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this.
customer_reviews.text: The first couple days, this watch didn't keep time at all, and would lose a minute or two every hour. Since then, it seems to have loosened up, and is doing much better. I still sometimes lose a minute a day, but I can keep an eye on it and reset it in the mornings. It isn't perfect, but it syncs easily and counts my steps accurately. Garmin's electronics are a 5, their actual mechanical watchmaking is more of a 3. If you want the most accurate, you should probably go for a digital model, but if you can't stand the techy wearing-a-computer look, this will do.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wurtman

customer_reviews.title: Great product Design, Poor quality, harder return due to defect.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of the device. I love the simplicity the activity tracker provided. I do not love the fact the control nob just disappeared. I had the watch delivered the end of August and it broke. I am unable to find where I can return as Amazon hasn't gotten back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Solarfinder

customer_reviews.title: No longer syncs
customer_reviews.text: I received this watch the day of release. It worked flawlessly up until the 8th of July. The device will no longer sync with my phone or a computer. I have made several attempts to contact Garmin about this with no responses. Update: as of July 12th the sync issue has been resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: :( disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pairs of watch . all perfectly. But one watch has a marriage: a small screen with an activity scale (a white spot) is damaged, the rest of this screen is working at the same time. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bleeding gray in the step bar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this five days ago and looks nice and seems to count steps fairly accurately. However, on the step bar a gray bleed is starting to occur. At first from the bottom, and now from the top of the bar. Doesn't seem to effect the watch's ability, but if it gets much worse I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Buba Hotep

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you are wheelchair bound
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks great! However, I basically live in a wheelchair, so it's step-counting function is useless. Also it's constantly telling me I need to be more active. According to the counter, yesterday I took 18 steps. I'm not sure if this thing is just inaccurate, or mocking my inability to use my legs. I wish I could walk.
customer_reviews.author: Brady F.

customer_reviews.title: Best basic tracker
customer_reviews.text: I love this fitness tracker. I've had one for years, and it stopped working. Unfortunately, Garmin no longer makes this model, undoubtedly because it's far more basic than most people want. It is a hybrid, with a traditional watch face. On the face are indicators for progress toward daily step goal and for how long you've been sitting and not moving around. It has a removable battery good for about a year. The sleep function is not great, but Garmin makes one of the most accurate step counters. This model was replaced with one that has so many bells and whistles that it has a rechargeable battery that needs to be charged every week.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s simple, just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love this because it fits seemlessly into my wardrobe. No one has to know it’s a tracker which is something I love. No need to charge it and the battery life is great. No real issues I check the app on my phone when I want to see how I’m doing with sleep and calories burned. Quick glimpse to give me basic things like how close I am to my step goal. It’s simplicity is what I love the most. I actually sold the Fitbit charge 3 unopened because I like my Garmin so well. Even bought my daughter one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Picky miss B

customer_reviews.title: This is a really neat fitness tracker
customer_reviews.text: This is a really neat fitness tracker and I am very happy with it... But it does have one issue the hands are hard to see... It has worked flawlessly and thanks to the app (Garmin Connect ) is very accurate when measuring steps due to the fact that the app allows you to ajust your stride... I got this tracker on sale from Amazon $68... I have seen that some people have had some problems with it not syncing with thier phones after awhile if I experience this I will update
customer_reviews.author: chess101

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful old school in modern day
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Back to analog, and simplify by getting the junk off the watch and on the phone instead. Just wish it had a light. Can't read it in the dark like all the digital watches!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I am a die hard Garmin fan. I had the vivofit, two different models of the forerunner...I wanted to love this watch. It in theory is EVERYTHING I am looking for - stylish, functional, and doesn't have features that I don't want for daily use. However...it won't sync to my phone. Ever. I'm soooo disappointed, Garmin. It's the first time you have ever let me down...
customer_reviews.author: jshsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.
customer_reviews.text: I have the Garmin vivomove Sport watch and I really like it. Let's me know how many steps I have walked at the end of the day. I sync it up with my phone and I can compare the days I have walked. Really good watch. Haven't tried the sleep feature.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable for the watch and Garmin
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing it less than 4 months, the dial (crown ) was falled off the the watch. I tried to let Garmin repair it and found that it was out of warrenty although the watch had one year warrenty.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Like this round face so much better, looks more feminine. My only regret is that I did not go with all stainless or all gold instead of white & stainless. I knew I would be putting on a different band and either all gold or all stainless would have been a better choice for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I love this Garmin watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this Garmin watch. I am not interested in getting an app for tracking my steps or fitness level, so I like that that is not a necessity for this watch. I like the look of the watch and think its a great value!
customer_reviews.author: altheticgirl

customer_reviews.title: very very very dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: I loved this watch, fit me much better than my activite steel. But it lasted one month and 3 days, then crown popped off and its now worthless, piece of junk, stick with a vivosmart or withings activite
customer_reviews.author: Frank T. Corey

product_meta.title: Garmin vívomove Sport - Black with Sport Band
product_meta.description: Color:Black Sport| Style:Watch Only| Configuration:SportWhether your steps come in 3-inch Heels or 3-piece suits, vivomove activity tracker gives you the luxury of all-day activity tracking without losing style. The elegant timepiece tracks steps, monitors sleep and syncs with the Garmin connect mobile app to view your stats in more detail. Your step progress is tracked throughout the day and can be seen on the Watch face. Its impressive 1-year battery life lets you track activity 24/7 without having to worry about charging it every night. Available in silicone, Leather, Rose gold-tone and stainless steel, choose which design complements your style best, and keep taking steps towards a healthier you.
feature_bullets: Easy to use - works right out of the box with no connectivity needed
Long battery life - up to 1 year of battery life, no Re-Charging needed
Tracks steps and move bar - the percent of your daily step goal is always displayed on the watch face so you can easily track the percentage of steps you’ve taken or how far you’ve traveled
Auto sync - automatically syncs with your mobile Device throughout the day with the push of the crown
Auto step goal - personalized goal each and every day designed to push you to be more active

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars327 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
